channel.title: JerryXu EE UESTC
channel.description: Recent content on JerryXu EE UESTC

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Jerry Xu (Ruijie Xu). I'm a year four undergraduate student from UESTC (University of Electric Science and Technology of China). I'm applying for PhD position 2023 Fall in Bioengineering aimed at computational neuroscience and BMI. I'm majoring in EE, and I have a profound interest in Neuroscience, and I've been working in the team Yao and my tutor Lu in the Key Laboratory for Neuroinformation of Medical Education since the end of year one in college.

item.title: About

I'm applying for PhD position 2023 Fall in Bioengineering aimed at computational neuroscience and BMI. I'm majoring in EE, and I have a profound interest in Neuroscience, and I've been working in the team Yao and my tutor Lu in the Key Laboratory for Neuroinformation of Medical Education since the end of year one in college.

item.title: Curriculum
item.description: This page is about my grades and curriculur acheivements Page Navigation Menu Grades Engineering English TDPS Elective Curriculum Faculty Essential Skills Scientific Research Skills Awards Team Desin Project Skills(TDPS) Grades GPA:3.78 Basic Curriculum: Calculus : 90 Probability Theory and Mathematical Statistics : 94 Programming : 86 Engineering English : 85 Specialized Curriculum: Digital Signal Processing : 89 Signals and Systems : 88 Circuit Anlysis and Design : 95 Team Design Project Skills(TDPS) : 89 Elective Cirriculum: An Introduction to Cognitive Neuroscience : 89 The Anatomical Basis of Brain-Intellignece Congnition : 90 Advanced Brain Magnetic Resonance Imaging and Analysis : 86 Above courses and grades shown are all directly related to the scientific research field.

item.title: Research Experience
item.description: This page is about my research experience Page Navigation Menu Research Experience Timeline Achievements Conference Abstract: The Neural Asymmetry Deviations Between Guitarists and Pianists OHBM (Organization of Human Brain Mapping) Journal Article: Different Music Training Modulates Theta Oscillation Associated with Executive ControlBrain Sciences Conference: National Academic Conference of Psychology Interests in Neuroscience Research Experience Timeline 2020.9.10: Selected into the Key Laboratory for Neuroinformation of Medical Education by my tutor Lu Jing Selected into a scientific research and education program held by the School of Life Science and Technology' 2020.

item.title: Life
item.description: This page is about my life including hobbies, friends, and family Page Navigation Menu Music-Guitar Sports-Basketball School Life High School Friends College Class Friends Club HotPot Friends Girlfriend Family Music-Guitar When I was about 9, I was playing with a toy when I suddenly pictured myself playing the electric guitar on the stage with a wild posture. Since then, I've been learning guitar, a 13-year guitar journey. I knew the classical guitar for 4 years and the acoustic guitar for 3 years.
